short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Prevent scam by checking if the website you are visting is a legit one by OCBC.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Recently, there are many fake OCBC website that tries to scam OCBC customers out of their hard earn money, by phishing for their username and passwords. This extension hopes to prevent that by telling you if the website is a legit one by OCBC. 

There will be a large message bar that will tell you if the website is a legit one or not. To activate the checking, click on the extension icon, and check the 'Check every page that I visit'.

This extension is very lightweight, and does not slow down your site at all. No personal information is collected.
